messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Mother's Airstrip Iota. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. An aggressively expansive plant life has been detected on lavaland.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention, the aggressive plant has originated from the ancient Necropolis gate, it seems to be immune to the planets ash storms, and can expand over anything that isn't lava. You are advised to terminate the plantlife if possible, there is a 60% chance it may board the station.-Central Command.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Vines have reached the station from lavaland. Your chances of eliminating the threat are 1 in 100.-Central Command.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Lavaland has been taken over by the vines.-WARNING. UNCONTAINED SINGULARITY DETECTED. LOCATIONS: Mining Outpost and -REDACTED.-

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: This is central command, we are considering the crew and the station itself lost, we will not be sending anymore emergency shuttles. Central Command out.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Hostile runtimes detected in all station systems, please deactivate your AI to prevent possible damage to its morality core.
